analysis.description:
ODZCrowdsale.getTotalAmountOfTokens (/unique_chucks/45/0x507a72e3f161ac03cc2b575f1526fdb7c5a3e70a.sol#393-415) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- currentPeriod == 1
	- currentPeriod == 2

MintableToken.claimTokens (/unique_chucks/45/0x507a72e3f161ac03cc2b575f1526fdb7c5a3e70a.sol#287-301) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(owner,balance) (/unique_chucks/45/0x507a72e3f161ac03cc2b575f1526fdb7c5a3e70a.sol#297-298)

ERC20.totalSupply should be constant (/unique_chucks/45/0x507a72e3f161ac03cc2b575f1526fdb7c5a3e70a.sol#63-65)
ERC20.transfersEnabled should be constant (/unique_chucks/45/0x507a72e3f161ac03cc2b575f1526fdb7c5a3e70a.sol#65)
ODZCrowdsale.addressFundReserv should be constant (/unique_chucks/45/0x507a72e3f161ac03cc2b575f1526fdb7c5a3e70a.sol#343-344)
ODZCrowdsale.addressFundTeam should be constant (/unique_chucks/45/0x507a72e3f161ac03cc2b575f1526fdb7c5a3e70a.sol#340-343)
